page.title: 02GLYN CEIRIOG SHOPS/SERVICES.
page.content: There are four small villages called Pontfadog, Dolywern, Llwynmawr and Glyn Ceiriog in our area. Glyn Ceiriog is the largest of the villages, it has the most shops and facilites e.g Grocer, Butcher, Shoe Shop and Pharmacy. Other services include a garage, a doctors surgery, a post office,a bank, and a Welsh language play school. Most people go to Oswestry or Wrexham to do their shopping.Farmers go to Oswestry usally on a Wednesday to the animal market.Some families go to the open air market which is known as the "The Bailey" by the local people.
